articles.title: Rabbitohs v Wests Tigers: Paulo nears return; Joey Leilua monitored - NRL.COM
articles.description: Rabbitohs v Wests Tigers: South Sydney are riding a four-game winning streak thanks in large part to the NRL's second-hottest attack and next in their sights is a Wests Tigers team that just coughed up 34 points to the previously win-less Cowboys.
